title: Spaghetti Carbonara üçù
summary: A classic Roman pasta dish with a creamy sauce made from eggs, hard cheese, cured pork (guanciale or pancetta), and black pepper. Ready in under 30 minutes!

title: Chicken Tikka Masala üçõ
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy. A rich and flavorful comfort food often served with naan.

title: Vegan Black Bean Burgers üçî
summary: Hearty, homemade black bean burgers that are packed with flavor and texture. A perfect meatless alternative for grilling or pan-frying. High in fiber and protein.

title: Overnight Oats with Berries üçì
summary: A simple, no-cook breakfast. Oats soaked in milk (or alternative) overnight, topped with fresh berries, nuts, and a drizzle of maple syrup. Great for meal prep.
